codaSDK

The com.codamotion.system package allows use of Java to access CODAmotion systems via a network connection.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.codamotion.system  

 

The com.codamotion.system package allows use of Java to access CODAmotion systems via a network connection. The set of functionality is the same as for the C-language codaSDK. This documentation provides a quick reference to the relevant functions. For details of their operation please refer to the user manual for the C-language codaSDK.  For general information on CODAmotion systems, please see the Charnwood Dynamics web site.
